articles.content: The study, published December 8 in the journal Cell, is part of the Human Cell Atlas initiative to map every cell in the human body. The researchers examined which genes are activated in different st… [+2446 chars]

articles.title: Japanese dengue vaccine becomes second approved by EU - The Star Online
articles.description: TOKYO (AFP): Japanese pharmaceutical company Takeda said the European Union had given the green light to its dengue fever vaccine, making it the second jab preventing the disease to be approved by the bloc.
